name: SERENITY MIND
description:
by VISVIC Entertainment
“The mind is the god in ourselves” as Aristoteles used to say, in Serenity Mind you play as the ghost “Spirit” in an Arcade-Defense-Shooter and try to defeat all the evil shadow creatures approaching you while keeping them from interrupting your deep meditation state.  CAN YOU STAY FOCUSED AND UNLOCK ALL SEVEN CHAKRA?
